name: Forbidden zone
description:
Immerse yourself in the dangerous and thrilling world of the Forbidden Zone, a vast open world multiplayer survival game where your main objective is to outwit and outlast your opponents.


As you explore the map in search of valuable loot and resources, you'll need to use all your cunning and strategy to survive. Whether it's by building a community, crafting weapons and items, or using stealth gameplay to evade danger, your chances of making it out alive will hinge on your ability to adapt and overcome. So, are you ready to put your survival skills to the test?



Never before a player can be a creator. He makes his own rules. Join the Forbidden Zone and meet the legends.

Key Futures

  • Crafting
  • Building
  • looting
  • exploring
  • Alpha
